import axios from"axios";const api=axios.create({baseURL:"http://127.0.0.1:8000/api",headers:{Accept:"application/json"}});// ðŸ”’ Attach token if it exists
api.interceptors.request.use(config=>{const token=localStorage.getItem("token");if(token){config.headers.Authorization="Bearer ".concat(token);}return config;},error=>Promise.reject(error));export default api;
